akn:section.akn:heading: Authorization of additional federal contributions for construction.

akn:content.akn:p: The Secretary of Transportation is authorized to make grants to the Transit Authority, in addition to the contributions authorized by ยง 9-1111.02, for the purpose of financing in part the cost of construction of the adopted regional system.
Federal grants under subsection (a) of this section for the adopted regional system shall be subject to ยง 9-1111.13 and to the following limitations and conditions:

There is authorized to be appropriated to the Secretary of Transportation for the purpose of making grants under subsection (a) of this section an aggregate amount not to exceed $1,700,000,000, except that no appropriation pursuant to this authorization shall be enacted for any fiscal year prior to fiscal year 1982.
